entries.title: Genome Annotation Transfer Utility (GATU): rapid annotation of viral genomes using a closely related reference genome.
Viral Genome DataBase: storing and analyzing genes and proteins from complete viral genomes.
Complete coding sequences of the rabbitpox virus genome.
Base-By-Base: single nucleotide-level analysis of whole viral genome alignments.
JDotter: a Java interface to multiple dotplots generated by dotter.
Viral genome organizer: a system for analyzing complete viral genomes.
New bioinformatics tools for viral genome analyses at Viral Bioinformatics--Canada.
Recent Hits Acquired by BLAST (ReHAB): a tool to identify new hits in sequence similarity searches.
Poxvirus orthologous clusters: toward defining the minimum essential poxvirus genome.
